name: rudeness
content:
rudeness noun [U]
(NOT POLITE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 the quality of being offensive or not polite: There is no excuse for rudeness.
the quality of relating to sex or going to the toilet: Slapstick and rudeness are not his stock in trade and his appeal is broader as a result.
More examplesFewer examplesSimon will never tolerate rudeness. Following the protest, eight students were suspended for misbehaviour, including rudeness to staff. Please forgive my rudeness, and come and dance with me. Poking fun at her recent personal problems is just downright rudeness. I couldn't believe the vulgarness and rudeness of the jokes.
